verses.verse: <S%H1288>Bless<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> you are <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1431>great.<s%> You are <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H1935>honor<s%> and <S%H1926>majesty.<s%>
He <S%H5844>covers<s%> himself with <S%H216>light<s%> as with a <S%H8008>garment.<s%> He stretches <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> like a <S%H3407>curtain.<s%>

He lays the <S%H7136>beams<s%> of his <S%H5944>rooms<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters.<s%> He <S%H7760>makes<s%> the <S%H5645>clouds<s%> his <S%H7398>chariot.<s%> He <S%H1980>walks<s%> on the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H7307>wind.<s%>
He <S%H6213>makes<s%> his <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H7307>winds;<s%> his <S%H8334>servants<s%> <S%H3857>flames<s%> of <S%H784>fire.<s%>
He <S%H3245>laid<s%> the <S%H4349>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> that it should not be <S%H4131>moved<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
You <S%H3680>covered<s%> it with the <S%H8415>deep<s%> as with a <S%H3830>cloak.<s%> The <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> above the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>
<S%H4480>At<s%> your <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> they <S%H5127>fled.<s%> At the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H7482>thunder<s%> they hurried <S%H2648>away.<s%>
The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H5927>rose,<s%> the <S%H1237>valleys<s%> sank <S%H3381>down,<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H2088>which<s%> you had assigned to <S%H3245>them.<s%>
You have <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H1366>boundary<s%> that they may not pass <S%H5674>over;<s%> that they <S%H7725>don't<s%> turn again to <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
He <S%H7971>sends<s%> forth <S%H4599>springs<s%> into the <S%H5158>valleys.<s%> They <S%H1980>run<s%> among the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>
They give <S%H8248>drink<s%> to every <S%H2416>animal<s%> of the <S%H7704>field.<s%> The wild <S%H6501>donkeys<s%> <S%H7665>quench<s%> their <S%H6772>thirst.<s%>
The <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> <S%H7931>nest<s%> by <S%H5414>them.<s%> They sing <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H6073>branches.<s%>
He <S%H8248>waters<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> from his <S%H5944>rooms.<s%> The <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H7646>filled<s%> with the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H4639>works.<s%>

He causes the <S%H2682>grass<s%> to <S%H6779>grow<s%> for the <S%H929>livestock,<s%> and <S%H6212>plants<s%> for <S%H120>man<s%> to <S%H3318>cultivate,<s%> that he may bring forth <S%H3899>food<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%>

<S%H3196>wine<s%> that makes <S%H8055>glad<s%> the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H582>man,<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> to make his <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6670>shine,<s%> and <S%H3899>bread<s%> that <S%H5582>strengthens<s%> <S%H582>man<s%>'s <S%H3824>heart.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H6086>trees<s%> are well <S%H7646>watered,<s%> the <S%H730>cedars<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> which he has <S%H5193>planted;<s%>
where the <S%H6833>birds<s%> make their <S%H7077>nests.<s%> The <S%H2624>stork<s%> makes its <S%H1004>home<s%> in the fir <S%H1265>trees.<s%>
The <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountains<s%> are for the wild <S%H3277>goats.<s%> The <S%H5553>rocks<s%> are a <S%H4268>refuge<s%> for the rock <S%H8227>badgers.<s%>
He <S%H6213>appointed<s%> the <S%H3394>moon<s%> for <S%H4150>seasons.<s%> The <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> when to <S%H3996>set.<s%>
You <S%H7896>make<s%> <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and it is <S%H3915>night,<s%> in which all the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%> <S%H7430>prowl.<s%>
The young <S%H3715>lions<s%> <S%H7580>roar<s%> after their <S%H2964>prey,<s%> and <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H400>food<s%> from <S%H410>God.<s%>
The <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H2224>rises,<s%> and they steal <S%H622>away,<s%> and lay <S%H7257>down<s%> in their <S%H4585>dens.<s%>
<S%H120>Man<s%> goes <S%H3318>forth<s%> to his <S%H6467>work,<s%> to his <S%H5656>labor<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> how <S%H7231>many<s%> are your <S%H4639>works!<s%> In <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> have you <S%H6213>made<s%> them <S%H776>all.<s%> The earth is <S%H4390>full<s%> of your <S%H7075>riches.<s%>

There is the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H7342>wide,<s%> in which are <S%H4557>innumerable<s%> <S%H7431>living<s%> <S%H6996>things,<s%> both small and <S%H1419>large<s%> <S%H2416>animals.<s%>
There the <S%H591>ships<s%> <S%H1980>go,<s%> and <S%H3882>leviathan,<s%> whom you <S%H3335>formed<s%> to play <S%H7832>there.<s%>
These all <S%H7663>wait<s%> for <S%H5414>you,<s%> that you may give them their <S%H400>food<s%> in due <S%H6256>season.<s%>
You <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H3950>them;<s%> they gather. You <S%H6605>open<s%> your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> they are <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H2896>good.<s%>

You <S%H5641>hide<s%> your <S%H6440>face:<s%> they are <S%H926>troubled;<s%> you take <S%H622>away<s%> their <S%H7307>breath:<s%> they <S%H1478>die,<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>
You <S%H7971>send<s%> forth your <S%H7307>Spirit:<s%> they are <S%H1254>created.<s%> You <S%H2318>renew<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>ground.<s%>
Let the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> endure <S%H5769>forever.<s%> Let <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in his <S%H4639>works.<s%>
He <S%H5027>looks<s%> at the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and it <S%H7460>trembles.<s%> He <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and they <S%H6225>smoke.<s%>
I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> as long as I <S%H2416>live.<s%> I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> praise to my <S%H430>God<s%> while I have any <S%H5750>being.<s%>
Let your <S%H7879>meditation<s%> be <S%H6149>sweet<s%> to <S%H8055>him.<s%> I will rejoice in <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Let <S%H2400>sinners<s%> be <S%H8552>consumed<s%> out of the <S%H776>earth.<s%> Let the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> be no <S%H1288>more.<s%> Bless <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul.<s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> <S%H3068>Yah!<s%>
